Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties, methods, and events of the <font face="courier new">DataGridView</font> class against its corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: This property notifies the control about the cell, which has uncommitted changes.
This event occurs after the value of a cell changes.
This property indicates whether columns can be generated automatically.
This event occurs when the user clicks the cell.
This method makes the changes in the current cell to the data cache.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(3), (B)-(5), (C)-(1), (D)-(2), and (E)-(4).
